summary: As a music journalist, SPEAKER_00 started making beats for Goa rappers in 2003 and wants to make beats as a music producer. He is a devotee of Bhole Baba and believes in Guru Gobind Singh and Guru Nanak Dev Ji. He was on a world tour with Shah Rukh Bhai, he was in America and he was running a big show on Star Plus for 1.5 years. Now he is touring India with Yoyo Honey Singh singing Punjabi songs in Chennai. Before 2012, he used to believe in God, but after that, he stopped believing in God
